medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of severe epigastric abdominal pain and emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began on the day of admission. The patient had last eaten 18 hours prior to the onset of symptoms. The patient has never experienced these symptoms before. His pain improved significantly with treatment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of left orbital reconstruction after a fight; history of left thumb surgery after a work accident.
medical_history.family_history: Parents are alive and in good health. Maternal grandmother had recurrent breast cancer and is doing well. Paternal grandfather died of shingles in his late years.
medical_history.social_history: Drinks 3 beers per day and may consume up to 8 beers on weekends. Smokes 0.5 - 1 pack of cigarettes per day but is surrounded by considerable cigarette smoke at work.
